name: Surrey Bancorp
short_description: Surrey Bancorp operates as the bank holding company for Surrey Bank & Trust that provides various banking products and services for individuals and small to medium sized businesses in Surry County, North Carolina and Patrick County, and Virginia and the surrounding area.
long_description: Surrey Bancorp operates as the bank holding company for Surrey Bank & Trust that provides various banking products and services for individuals and small to medium sized businesses in Surry County, North Carolina and Patrick County, and Virginia and the surrounding area. Its deposit products include checking and savings accounts, certificates of deposit, overdrafts, and individual retirement accounts. The company also offers mortgages; real estate, consumer, and personal loans; lines of credit; commercial credit products; government-guaranteed loans; and safe deposit boxes and credit cards. In addition, it provides cash management, international, merchant card, and other business services; busniness and personal property, and casualty insurance; and electronic banking services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Mount Airy, North Carolina.
